channel.title: [AN IDEA/SUGGESTION] Suggestions/ideas section and general talking
channel.description: I would think that if we had one of these areas more people would come to the moparscape community just to chat about other things than private servers. I mean we could even have a spamming section because I have an smfforfree and I know you can make boards that do not benefit your post count so yeah.... I would think we need one because I have allot of suggestions on my mind but I won't list them here. Please just take a look at this and consider it.

item.title: [AN IDEA/SUGGESTION] Suggestions/ideas section and general talking
item.dc:creator: @The_Prodigyscape The Prodigyscape
item.description:
@The_Prodigyscape wrote:

I would think that if we had one of these areas more people would come to the moparscape community just to chat about other things than private servers.
I mean we could even have a spamming section because I have an smfforfree and I know you can make boards that do not benefit your post count so yeah…
I would think we need one because I have allot of suggestions on my mind but I won’t list them here.
Please just take a look at this and consider it.
